title: 90 Gems
author: 90 Gems
content: I have been working as a graphic designer for 7 years, and in the last year, I have focused on projects related to cryptocurrency. Now I need to create some portfolio pieces to showcase my skills and experience in this area.Therefore, if you are planning to launch your project related to DeFi, NFT or Web 3.0, I can do branding for you completely free of charge. The only conditions are minimal revisions, complete freedom, and an undefined timeframe for completing the work.You can check out some of my designs here:https://i.postimg.cc/MHX1vFfc/image.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/cdvD15ms/image.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/GhHj2HvM/image.pnghttps://i.postimg.cc/VmDTktPF/image.png

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: If you only accept altcoins for your service, you should move this topic to Service Announcements (Altcoins).If you accept Bitcoin as payment method for your service, you can move it to Services board.Use bbcode for your images and post links here. Me or others can help you to quote your post and show images (with bbcode).Good luck!

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: 90 Gems on March 25, 2023, 11:26:57 PM-cut-The only conditions are minimal revisions, complete freedom, and an undefined timeframe for completing the work.-cutWell if you are working for totally free of charge that's understandable. But what's the catch? Why are you doing this for free?For example if i wanted your services, i wouldn't obviously "hire" you as you are not taking any money, but what would you require from me if i wanted to order branding from you?

comments.author: 90 Gems
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on March 26, 2023, 09:44:38 PMWell if you are working for totally free of charge that's understandable. But what's the catch? Why are you doing this for free?For example if i wanted your services, i wouldn't obviously "hire" you as you are not taking any money, but what would you require from me if i wanted to order branding from you?Well, actually I just want to fill my portfolio with some works related to crypto, and I could make up some fake projects and make design for it, but I want it so that people can click some link and see that the work was real and people really use my design. and I actually wanna practice on some real case but don't want to promise certain level of quality and speed, I wanna do it in my own pace. so if your project is in the very beginning, and the budget is tight, my proposal is just perfect for you

Also branding is a number of things, are you doing facebook and other social media covers? Just still pictures or gif type animations? Are you doing vector or bitmap graphics? Can you use blender and other 3d softwares or is everything make in 2d looking like 3d?Logos, concepts, business cards? What are your limits? What will you do and what won't you do?Would you sign us to have full copyright ownership of the files you provide or is this more of like anon hobby design?I might have few microcap projects but i would just like to know more.

comments.author: kaseygriffin
comments.body: Looking at some of the templates, I understand why it's free, and I'm not a professional in branding design. However due to the nature of the work I see that some fields are being gradually replaced by scientific and technological developments, I appreciate the kindness you expressed, but there are indeed ways to build Today's brand is extremely beautiful and professional. Suggest to OP, should use AI to be more creative in improving product quality.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Nothing is free sir, I looked at your work it is well done, I know your end game is how to monetize your skill very soon. I will advise you to look towards joining some of these low-cap projects and offer to be their graphic designer, they will pay you will their tokens because they don't have money to pay, and if the tokens pump or do well it is a win-win situation for everyone involved. Now that ZKsync is attracting a lot of developers I would advise you to look into this direction and look for good teams. Wishing you the best

The only conditions are minimal revisions, complete freedom, and an undefined timeframe for completing the work.Better post requirements on what projects you want to help to launch, there are so many scam and fake projects you are directly helping these scammers if you just pick projects just to create your portfolio, your first set of portfolios should be legit and high potential projects, as much as possible do not accept ICO so you will not get the blame for helping scammers when they run away with investor's money.
